channel.title: videos on A haven for Unix & Linux deviants
channel.description: Recent content in videos on A haven for Unix & Linux deviants

item.title: The Max Headroom Pirating Incident
item.description: Really interesting Documentary on the incident. Kind of makes you think about that struggle between Broadcasting Companies, and the Jackers who wanted to take over their airwaves. I would assume that this trick is still possible in 3rd-World countries where the Media does not have the $$$ like US Broadcasters. Plus… Max Headroom was an awesome show! I miss a lot of the older/weirder shows from my youth.

item.title: The Binchotan Stove
item.description: Really cool stuff. I will have to try and make one of these. Binchotan is really expensive in this part of the country though!!

item.title: CFW 5.00 M33 to 5.50 GEN-B
item.description: Not sure if this works, but I am destined to try! Seems like newer games are requiring the 5.50 firmware, but I am still running CFW 5.00 M33! Where the hell is Dark-Alex gone to? Oh well… for your viewing pleasure! The instructions in the comments are pretty decent. If you need your PSP to be running Custom Firmware… let me know.

item.title: District 8 (Alive in Joburg)
item.description: So this past weekend I had a chance to see the new movie from director Neil Blomkamp, District 9 . If you haven’t seen District 9 yet, you owe it to yourself to see this movie. The story is great, and the special effects are subtle yet impressive. The director has created a world were the main event is not the Aliens them selfs, but rather their environment & quest to go home.

item.title: I must have died an gone to heaven!
item.description: I cant believe that this is actually a reality, but one of my favorite horror movies has been transformed into a Musical! Evil Dead the Musical If your like me then you should have been a fan of Sam Rami’s first movie. Scary & Hilarious at the same time!

item.title: Windows 7 Features Demo
item.description: Did I miss something? Vista just came out last-year, and now M$ is working on the new OS!! A Word to Microsoft Development Managers, PLEASE FIX VISTA BEFORE MOVING ON!!! :P Digg Link
